'''Hilichurl Champion''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Stonehide Lawachurl]] while its [[Geo]] Armor is still active.

==Gameplay Notes==
*Also unlocks if a teammate clears the condition during [[Co-Op Mode]].
